title: 139. Robot-To-Robot Delivery Experience | Piestro
description: Piestro is a robotic pizza shop able to deliver high-quality artisanal pizzas within 3 minutes. Their fully-automated machines are being designed with the aim of allowing for zero contact food preparation, zero food waste, consistent quality, and a much lower cost of operation.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
